LAGOSUS Lake characteristics

Source: R/LAGOSUS-package.R
lake_characteristics.Rd

LAGOSUS Lake characteristics

Details

oldvariable_nameoldvariable_descriptionoldunits lagoslakeid
unique lake identifier developed by LAGOS-USNAlake_waterarea_ha
surface area of lake waterbody polygon from NHD (excludes islands)hectarelake_totalarea_ha
surface area within outer boundary of lake waterbody polygon from NHD (includes islands)hectarelake_islandarea_ha
surface area of islands within outer boundary of lake waterbody polygon from NHDhectarelake_perimeter_m
perimeter of outer boundary of lake waterbody polygon from the NHD (excludes islands)meterlake_islandperimeter_m
perimeter of islands within the lake waterbody polygon from the NHDmeterlake_shorelinedevfactor
shoreline development factor = lake_perimeter / (2*√(π*waterarea))NAlake_mbgconhull_length_m
the longest distance entirely within the lake polygon between any two vertices of the minimum bounding geometry convex hull that encloses the lake polygonmeterlake_mbgconhull_width_m
the shortest distance entirely within the lake polygon between any two vertices of the minimum bounding geometry convex hull that encloses the lake polygonmeterlake_mbgconhull_orientation_deg
orientation (from 0 to 180 decimal degrees clockwise from north) of the longest line connecting two vertices entirely within both the convex hull and the lake polygondegreelake_mbgrect_length_m
length of the minimum bounding geometry rectangle by area enclosing the lake polygonmeterlake_mbgrect_width_m
width of the minimum bounding geometry rectangle by area enclosing the lake polygonmeterlake_mbgrect_arearatio
ratio between lake_waterarea_ha (* 10000 m^2/ha) and the area of the minimum bounding rectangle by area of the lake polygon; value near 1 indicates lake shape is rectangularNAlake_meanwidth_m
mean width of the lake calculated as lake water area (lake_area_ha* 10000 m^2/ha) divided by the convex hull length of the focal lake polygon (lake_mbgconhull_length_m)meterlake_connectivity_class
hydrologic connectivity class of the focal lake determined from the NHD network considering both permanent and intermittent/ephemeral flowNAlake_connectivity_fluctuates
indicates whether the lake's connectivity classification depends on non-permanent flowNAlake_connectivity_permanent
hydrologic connectivity class of the focal lake determined from the NHD network considering only permanent flowNAlake_lakes1ha_upstream_ha
total area of lakes >= 1 ha upstream of the focal lake, connected via surface streamshectarelake_lakes4ha_upstream_ha
total area of lakes >= 4 ha upstream of the focal lake, connected via surface streamshectarelake_lakes10ha_upstream_ha
total area of lakes >= 10 ha upstream of the focal lake, connected via surface streamshectarelake_lakes1ha_upstream_n
count of lakes >= 1 ha upstream of the focal lake, connected via surface streamscountlake_lakes4ha_upstream_n
count of lakes >= 4 ha upstream of the focal lake, connected via surface streamscountlake_lakes10ha_upstream_n
count of lakes >= 10 ha upstream of the focal lake, connected via surface streamscountlake_glaciatedlatewisc
